SpicyAccessibility Demo

A comprehensive web accessibility toolkit for making websites more inclusive.

About SpicyAccessibility

SpicyAccessibility is a powerful yet lightweight accessibility widget that allows visitors to customize their browsing experience according to their needs. It provides tools for users with visual, motor, cognitive, and other accessibility requirements.

Click the accessibility button (♿️) in the bottom-right corner of the screen to see the widget in action!

Key Features

Text Adjustments

Adjust font size, enable dyslexia-friendly font, change line height and letter spacing for improved readability.

Visual Adaptations

Toggle high contrast mode, dark/light themes, grayscale filter, and more to accommodate different visual needs.

Reading Aids

Use the reading guide, focus mode, and link highlighting to maintain focus and improve navigation.

Navigation Support

Access page structure view, keyboard navigation helpers, and more to simplify website navigation.

Multimedia Controls

Utilize screen reader integration and enhanced media playback controls for better audio experiences.

Profile Management

Save and load accessibility configurations to quickly apply your preferred settings across sessions.

Installation

Add SpicyAccessibility to your website with a few simple steps:

Method 1: CDN

<!-- Add to your HTML -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/spicy-accessibility@1.0.0/dist/spicy-accessibility.min.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/spicy-accessibility@1.0.0/dist/spicy-accessibility.min.css">

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    SpicyAccessibility.init();
  });
</script>

Method 2: NPM

npm install spicy-accessibility
// In your JavaScript file
import { SpicyAccessibility } from 'spicy-accessibility';
import 'spicy-accessibility/dist/spicy-accessibility.min.css';

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  SpicyAccessibility.init();
});
